Package org.midao.jdbc.core.exception

Exception handling

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ExceptionHandler Midao Exception Handler.
 

Class Summary
BaseExceptionHandler Base ExceptionHandler implementation
ExceptionUtils Various utilities used by ExceptionHandlers
 

Exception Summary
MjdbcException Default Midao JDBC Exception which can be caught and mitigated
MjdbcRuntimeException Default Midao JDBC Exception thrown due to internal logic errors
MjdbcSQLException Default Midao JDBC Exception thrown during interaction with JDBC driver
